Posts.Title: biopsy today, scared rezski Thatgirl

Posts.Content: Feb 3, 2012 11:18AM rezski wrote: Results came back B9. No evidence of malignancy. Doctor said to follow up with the breast surgeon to get her opinion. The  biopsy read that it had fibrocystic changes with proliferative activity. I'm so glad to get a B9 result. My mom cried. :)
Posts.Title: biopsy today, scared rezski Thatgirl

Posts.Content: Mar 8, 2012 04:48PM rezski wrote: I just read your posts. first hugs to you!! I know the waiting is hard I found a lump in my left breast about 6 weeks ago, I had the mammogram, ultrasound and core needle biopsy.  Last week I had the lumpectomy because mine had its own blood supply.  It was a Birads 4. My results came back B9, I'll pray that yours will too.  The waiting was so hard, but I found this site was the best to read and find comfort knowing I wasnt alone in this.

Posts.Title: Can't stop worrying and googling ls1229 Cat123

Posts.Content: Feb 1, 2012 05:05PM rezski wrote: I had another question, I had my mammo and ultra sound, and they did the biopsy today, from what I've been reading the chances of B9 are good. I am just concerned with the tumor having 2 cysts within it and it having an internal blood flow. The radioligist report stated that it was circumscribed and hyposchoic. I know my only answers will come from the biopsy reports, I am just over thinking everything and getting myself very anxious.......
Posts.Title: biopsy today, scared rezski Thatgirl

Posts.Content: rezski wrote: I am 36, single mom of 4 and found a lump in my left breast a week and a half ago. I saw the doctor and had my mammogram and ultrasound done last friday it was found to be a tumor with 2 cysts with in and about 3cm big, but it has an internal blood supply. It was given a birads 4. I have my biopsy scheduled for 1:00pm today and I'm just scared about the results. Stacey :) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: biopsy today, scared rezski Thatgirl

Posts.Content: Feb 1, 2012 04:06PM rezski wrote: thank you, I just got back from the biopsy, it wasn't too bad. They said the doctor should call be by Tuesday and let me know.... now I wait, which is so hard to do. It's going to be a LONG weekend!!!
Posts.Title: biopsy today, scared rezski Thatgirl

Posts.Content: rezski wrote: I posted first time yesterday, but I can't stop thinking about what the results are going to say. I keep feeling like I can't breathe. I'm trying not to search the internet, but it seems hard to stay off. I guess what scres me most is that the ultrasound stated internal blood flow.....I don't know why I keep focusing on that. I have a great boyfriend who has been there the whole time, and my family is amazing. But we haven't said anything to the kids. Their father really is a dead beat, so I want to keep things "normal" for the kids until I know something. But I find myself unable to cry at home because I don't want to upset the kids, I work full time, so I can't get upset there, and now can't really cry at all about this.....  I am glad I found this site though, reading through everyone's journey's seems to help me :) I guess I'm just venting today. I wish I had my results so I knew exactly how to feel and what I'm dealing with....  Thanks for listening Stacey :) Log in to post a reply
